type UpdatePanel = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface IUpdatePanel

summary.span: Enables sections of a page to be partially rendered without a postback.

span.span: Enables sections of a page to be partially rendered without a postback.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [正在刷新 UpdatePanel 的内容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content](#refreshing_updatepanel_content) - [UpdatePanel 使用情况UpdatePanel Usage](#updatepanel_usage) - [应用样式Applying Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是在 ASP.NET 中的 AJAX 功能的核心部分。 controls are a central part of AJAX functionality in ASP.NET. 它们用于启用局部页面呈现的控件。They are used with the control to enable partial-page rendering. 在仅页面的一部分进行更新时，局部页面呈现可降低对同步回发和完成页更新的需要。Partial-page rendering reduces the need for synchronous postbacks and complete page updates when only part of the page has to be updated. 局部页面呈现可改善用户体验，因为它减少了整页回发期间发生，并且提高了网页交互性的屏幕闪烁。Partial-page rendering improves the user experience because it reduces the screen flicker that occurs during a full-page postback and improves Web page interactivity. ## 正在刷新 UpdatePanel 的内容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content 控件启用局部页面呈现后，可以执行更新整个页面回发或更新的内容的一个或多个异步回发控件。When partial-page rendering is enabled, a control can perform a postback that updates the whole page or an asynchronous postback that updates the content of one or more controls. 控件是否导致异步回发和更新控件取决于以下：Whether a control causes an asynchronous postback and updates an control depends on the following: - 如果属性控件设置为、在每次回发来源于页面上更新控件的内容。If the property of the control is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from the page. 这包括从控件内其他异步回发控件和外部的控件的回发控件。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果属性设置为、在以下情况下更新控件的内容：If the property is set to , the control's content is updated in the following circumstances: - 当调用方法显式控制。When you call the method of the control explicitly. - 当控件嵌套在另一个更新控件，并且父面板。When the control is nested inside another control, and the parent panel is updated. - 通过定义为触发器控件时导致回发`Triggers`属性控件。When a postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the `Triggers` property of the control. 在此方案中，该控件显式触发面板内容的更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 控件均可以是内部或外部触发器与之关联的控件。The control can be either inside or outside the control that the trigger is associated with. - 当属性设置为`true`和子控件的控制会导致回发。When the property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 子控件的嵌套控件不会导致对外部的更新控件，除非它们显式定义为触发器。Child controls of nested controls do not cause an update to the outer control unless they are explicitly defined as triggers. 设置的组合属性`false`和属性不允许，并且将引发异常。The combination of setting the property to `false` and the property to is not allowed and will throw an exception. 当控件将执行的异步 post，它会添加自定义的 HTTP 标头。When the control performs an asynchronous post, it adds a custom HTTP header. 某些代理中删除此自定义的 HTTP 标头。Some proxies remove this custom HTTP header. 如果发生这种情况，服务器将作为常规的回发，这会导致客户端错误处理该请求。If this occurs, the server handles the request as a regular postback, which causes a client error. 若要解决此问题，请在执行异步发布时插入自定义窗体字段。To resolve this issue, insert a custom form field when you perform asynchronous posts. 然后检查标头或在服务器代码中的自定义的表单域。Then check the header or the custom form field in server code. ## UpdatePanel 使用情况UpdatePanel Usage 你可以使用多个控件更新不同的独立页区域。You can use multiple controls to update different page regions independently. 当包含一个或多页控件首次呈现时，所有的所有内容都呈现和发送到浏览器控件。When the page that contains one or more controls is first rendered, all the content of all controls are rendered and sent to the browser. 在后续异步回发，每个内容控件可能不会更新，具体取决于面板设置和单个面板的客户端或服务器的逻辑。On subsequent asynchronous postbacks, the content of each control might not be updated depending on the panel settings and on client or server logic for individual panels. 你还可以使用以下方案中的控件：You can also use controls in the following scenarios: - 在用户控件。In user controls. - 在 master 和内容的页数。On master and content pages. - 嵌套在其他控件。Nested inside other controls. - 内部模板化控件，如或控件。Inside templated controls such as the or controls. 以声明方式或以编程方式，可以添加控件。 controls can be added declaratively or programmatically. 你可以添加控制以编程方式，但不是能以编程方式添加触发器。You can add an control programmatically, but you cannot add triggers programmatically. 若要创建类似于触发器的行为，您可以为异步回发控件注册页上的控件。To create trigger-like behavior, you can register a control on the page as an asynchronous postback control. 执行此操作通过调用方法控件。You do this by calling the method of the control. 然后可以创建的事件处理程序在响应异步回发，和中的处理程序，调用运行方法控件。You can then create an event handler that runs in response to the asynchronous postback, and in the handler, call the method of the control. ## 应用样式Applying Styles 控件接受 expando 属性。The control accepts expando attributes. 这样可以为控件呈现 HTMLelements 设置 CSS 类。This lets you set a CSS class for the HTMLelements that the controls render. 例如，你可能创建下面的示例所示的标记：For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 在前面的示例的标记上呈现 HTML 类似于以下运行页面时：The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示的不同用法控件。The following examples show different uses of the control. **UpdatePanel 控件内的控件****Controls Inside an UpdatePanel Control** 下面的示例演示如何将内部控件控制，以减少屏幕闪烁，当你发布到服务器。The following example shows how to put controls inside an control to reduce screen flicker when you post to the server. 在此示例中，和控件位于控件。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 默认情况下，属性是和属性是`true`。By default, the property is and the property is `true`. 因此，子控件的面板会导致异步回发。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **UpdatePanel 控件使用的主/从方案****Master/Detail Scenario with UpdatePanel Controls** 在下面的示例中，控件用于显示订单和订单详细信息从 Northwind 数据库的主/从方案中。In the following example, an control is used in a master/detail scenario that shows orders and order details from the Northwind database. 一个控件包含显示的订单列表的控件。One control contains the control that displays a list of orders. 第二个控件包含显示一份订单的详细信息的控件。A second control contains a control that displays the details of one order. 从第一个表中选择一个订单，将第二个表中显示该订单的详细信息。When you select an order from the first table, details for that order are displayed in the second table. 第二个表进行更新以异步方式基于第一个表中的选择。The second table is updated asynchronously based on the selection in the first table. Orders 摘要表中的排序和分页操作也会导致部分更新。The sorting and paging operations in the orders summary table also cause partial updates. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample2VB.aspx#2)] 如果将放控件内部控制，设置控件的属性`true`不支持。If you put a control inside an control, setting the control's property to `true` is not supported. 但是，因为控件支持异步回发，更改任何回发控件内部控件导致相同的排序和分页回调行为。However, because the control supports asynchronous postbacks, any postbacks that change the control inside an control cause the same behavior as sorting and paging callbacks. **在模板中使用 UpdatePanel 控件****Using an UpdatePanel Control in a Template** 在下面的示例中，控件用于在项模板中的控件。In the following example, an control is used in the item template of a control. 会自动生成中每个数据行的控件。 controls in each data row are generated automatically. 每个行的控件包含控件来显示该行中的项的数量和控件以降低和增加该数量。Each row's control contains a control to display the quantity of the item in that row and a control to decrease and increase the quantity. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample3CS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample3VB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 动态地添加控制到页上，创建一个新实例，并将子控件添加到由该实例的公开控件对象属性。To dynamically add an control to a page, create a new instance and then add child controls to the control object that is exposed by the instance's property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何动态创建控件并将它添加到页。The following example shows how to dynamically create an control and add it to a page. 当你单击按钮位于内的控件，该消息由已刷新的日期和时间。When you click the button inside the control, the message is refreshed with the date and time. 子控件通过使用添加属性。Child controls are added by using the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether postbacks from immediate child controls of an control update the panel's content.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether postbacks from immediate child controls of an control update the panel's content.

value.span: 如果回发从直接子控件的控制更新面板的内容; 否则为。

span.span: if postbacks from immediate child controls of the control update the panel's content; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`如果你想从的即时子控件的回发控件以使该面板的内容的更新。Set the property to `true` if you want postbacks from immediate child controls of the control to cause an update of the panel's content. 子控件的嵌套控件不会导致父更新控件的内容，除非调用方法显式或为触发器定义的子控件。Child controls of nested controls will not cause an update of the parent control's content unless you call the method explicitly or you define the child controls as triggers. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为和属性设置为`false`、期间引发异常方法。When the property is set to and the property is set to `false`, an exception is thrown during the method. 不允许此属性组合控件。This combination of properties is not allowed for the control. 其中可能设置的情况下到`false`时有两个控制，并且您想要更新的第二个面板的内容，但不是会更新其自己的内容的第一个面板来自的回发。A scenario where you might set to `false` is when you have two controls and you want a postback from the first panel to update the content of the second panel but not update its own content. 例如，第一个面板可能是要购买的产品列表，并且第二个面板可能购物车。For example, the first panel might be a list of products to buy and the second panel might be a shopping cart.

summary.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 定义的内容的实例控件。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含随即显示在内容控制呈现时。The property contains the content that appears inside an control when it is rendered. 以声明方式或以编程方式，你可以创建模板的内容。You can create the template's content declaratively or programmatically. 内容模板控件是一个单实例模板。The content template of an control is a single-instance template. 因此，它包含控件的属性可直接在页面上而无需使用方法。Therefore, the properties of the controls it contains can be accessed directly on the page without using the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 将项添加到控件以声明方式中，添加``元素开始标记和结束标记之间控件。To add items to the control declaratively, add an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 内部``元素标记，声明其他控件和 HTML 元素。Inside the `` element tags, declare other controls and HTML elements. 将项添加到动态控制，请使用属性，使您可以添加子控件，而无需创建实现的自定义模板接口。To add items to the control dynamically, use the property, which enables you to add child controls without having to create a custom template that implements the interface.

exception.span: The property of the control is set after an instance of the template is created or after the content template container is created.

span.span: The property of the control is set after an instance of the template is created or after the content template container is created.

span.span: Gets a control object to which you can programmatically add child controls.

value.span: A对象，用于定义的内容控件。

span.span: A object that defines the content of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够以编程方式添加到的子控件而无需定义继承自的自定义模板的控件接口。The property enables you to programmatically add child controls to the control without having to define a custom template that inherits from the interface. 如果要添加到内容控制以声明方式或通过设计器中，你应将内容添加到属性使用``元素。If you are adding content to the control declaratively or through a designer, you should add content to the property by using a `` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式指定属性控件。The following example shows how to programmatically specify the property of an control. 属性时设置控件`Button1`单击。The property of a control is set when `Button1` is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Creates a object that acts as a container for child controls that define the control's content.

span.span: Creates a object that acts as a container for child controls that define the control's content.

returns.span: A container for the control's content.

span.span: A container for the control's content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法适合使用由控件开发人员想要扩展控件。This method is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在派生类中，可以提供一个不同的根控件充当容器，你控件的内容。For example, in derived classes, you can provide a different root control that acts as a container for your control's content. 默认实现返回对象。The default implementation returns a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写在自定义的方法控件始终呈现`
`和``面板的内容的元素。The following example shows how to override the method in a custom control to always render the `
` and `` elements for the panel's content. 自定义控件定义的名为的公共属性`GroupingText`，它是字符串文字内``元素。The custom control defines a public property named `GroupingText` that is a string literal inside the `` element. 自定义控件名为`CustomUpdatePanel`派生自和替代方法。A custom control named `CustomUpdatePanel` derives from and overrides the method. Put`CustomUpdatePanel`类网站的 App_Code 文件夹中的源代码。Put the `CustomUpdatePanel` class source code in the Web site's App_Code folder. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.vb#2)] 自定义页上使用控件一样控件的本质。The custom control is used on the page just as the control is. 下面的示例演示一个包含自定义网页控件。The following example shows a page that contains the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用由控件开发人员。The method is used by control developers. 此方法是受保护的密封，因为它是继承的类可见类，但它不能重写。Because this method is protected and sealed, it is visible to classes that inherit from the class, but it cannot be overridden. 此方法重写基实现来返回一个专用对象引发时， ， ， ，或方法类被调用。This method overrides the base implementation to return a specialized object that throws an when the , , , , or method of the class is invoked. 若要更改的内容控件中，修改的子控件属性。To change the content of the control, modify the child controls of the property.

summary.span: Initializes the control trigger collection if partial-page rendering is enabled.

span.span: Initializes the control trigger collection if partial-page rendering is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未启用局部页面呈现，在中定义的触发器不初始化属性，因为它们不起任何作用。If partial-page rendering is not enabled, the triggers that are defined in the property are not initialized because they have no effect. 属性控件获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用局部页面呈现。The property of the control gets or sets a value that indicates whether partial-page rendering is enabled. 属性控件获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否支持局部页面呈现。The property of the control gets or sets a value that indicates whether partial-page rendering is supported.

span.para: 当你重写方法时，一定要调用基类，因此，如果启用了局部页面呈现注册触发器。
When you override the method, make sure to call the base class so that triggers are registered if partial-page rendering is enabled.

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is being updated as a result of an asynchronous postback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性适合由控件开发人员需要了解何时使用因异步回发而更新控件。The property is intended for use by control developers who want to know when an control is being updated as a result of an asynchronous postback. 在页面开发方案，使用属性来确定是否由于异步回发处理页。In page development scenarios, use the property to determine whether a page is processing as a result of an asynchronous postback.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an control's content is enclosed in an HTML or element.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an control's content is enclosed in an HTML or element.
One of the values.

value.span: 默认值是以便面板的内容包含在 HTML元素。

span.span: The default is so that the content of the panel is enclosed in an HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果属性设置为，则内容的控件呈现在 HTML 内``元素。If the property is set to , the content of an control is rendered inside an HTML `` element. 如果属性设置为，呈现在 HTML 内`
`元素。If the property is set to , it is rendered inside an HTML `
` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以声明方式。The following example shows how to set the property declaratively. 控件名为`UpdatePanel1`以 HTML 格式呈现``元素。The control named `UpdatePanel1` is rendered in an HTML `` element. 如果属性已设置为，则生成的段落将出现不相互连接的方式由于 HTML`
`元素呈现。If the property were set to , the resulting paragraph would appear disjointed because of the way in which the HTML `
` element is rendered. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode/CS/UpdatePanelRenderModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode/VB/UpdatePanelRenderModeVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，属性返回`true`如果显式调用方法或如果属性设置为。By default, the property returns `true` if the method was explicitly called or if the property is set to . 此属性适合使用由控件开发人员想要扩展控件。This property is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在派生类中，可能会提供其他逻辑来确定是否应更新控件。For example, in derived classes, you might provide additional logic to determine whether an control should be updated.

A collection of objects of type and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取已为定义的所有触发器的集合控件。The property gets a collection of all the triggers that have been defined for the control. (您可以通过使用以声明方式定义触发器**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器**对话框中，在设计器或通过使用``元素控件。)该集合包含和对象。(You can define triggers declaratively by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by using the `` element of the control.) The collection includes and objects. 在中定义的声明性触发器集合不会跟踪视图状态中。Declarative triggers that are defined in the collection are not tracked in view state. 是一个命名的容器的控件用作触发器，导致回发的其所有子控件的都行为为触发器。When a control that is a naming container is used as a trigger, all its child controls that cause postback behave as triggers.

summary.span: Causes an update of the content of an control.

span.span: Causes an update of the content of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在调用时，启用了页以进行局部页面呈现，方法，在浏览器中更新控件的内容。If the page is enabled for partial-page rendering, when you invoke the method, the control's content is updated in the browser. 调用方法如果你有必须执行，以确定服务器代码是否应更新控件。Call the method if you have server code that must execute to determine whether an control should be updated. 如果你打算使用方法，设置属性。If you plan to use the method, set the property to . 如果你想更新服务器逻辑中的面板的决定，请确保属性是`false`和没有显式触发器定义面板。If you want the decision to update the panel in server logic, make sure that the property is `false` and that no explicit triggers are defined for the panel. 在典型的页面开发方案中，如果定义触发器，或如果属性是`true`为控件，页生命周期内自动调用方法。In a typical page development scenario, if you define triggers or if the property is `true` for the control, the method is automatically called during the page life cycle. 如果属性未定义为控制，面板中的任何更新将发生。If the property is not defined for the control, no updates of the panel will occur. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来更新的内容控制自上次更新后已用时间超过五秒具有时。The following example uses the method to update the content of an control when more than five seconds have elapsed since the last update. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property is set to .

span.span: \- or – The method is called during or after the page's event.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when an control's content is updated.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when an control's content is updated.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件不是在另一个控件，面板将更新的设置根据和属性，以及的触发器的集合。When an control is not inside another control, the panel is updated according to the settings of the and properties, together with the collection of triggers. 当控件位于另一个控件，子面板中自动更新父面板后更新。When an control is inside another control, the child panel is automatically updated when the parent panel is updated. 内容控件将在以下情况下更新：The content of an control is updated in the following circumstances: - 如果属性设置为、上每个从在页面上的任何位置执行回发时将更新控件的内容。If the property is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from anywhere on the page. 这包括从控件内其他异步回发控件和外部的控件的回发控件。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果控件嵌套在另一个更新控件和父更新面板。If the control is nested inside another control and the parent update panel is updated. - 如果属性设置为，并出现以下情况之一：If the property is set to , and one of the following conditions occurs: - 你调用方法显式控制。You call the method of the control explicitly. - 通过定义为触发器的控件导致回发属性控件。The postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the property of the control. 在此方案中，该控件显式触发面板内容的更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 控件均可以是内部或外部定义该触发器的控件。The control can be either inside or outside the control that defines the trigger. - 属性设置为`true`和子控件的控制会导致回发。The property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 子控件的嵌套控件不会导致对外部的更新控件，除非将其显式定义为触发器。A child control of a nested control does not cause an update to the outer control unless it is explicitly defined as a trigger. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. 此示例声明两个控件。The example declares two controls. 在第一个面板中，属性设置为。In the first panel, the property is set to . 在第二个面板中，设置为。In the second panel, is set to . 外部这两个面板的一个按钮注册为异步回发控件，通过调用方法控件。A button outside both panels is registered as an asynchronous postback control by calling the method of the control. 在按钮的`Click`事件处理程序，如果时间超过五秒经过自其上次更新后会调用方法的第一个面板。In the button's `Click` event handler, the method of the first panel is called if more than five seconds have elapsed since its last update. 在此方案中，仅当上次面板刷新已超过五秒，将更新的面板的内容。In this scenario, the panel’s content is updated only if the last panel refresh was more than five seconds ago. 第二个面板的内容会始终更新。The content of the second panel is always updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: The specified type is not one of the values.

span.span: The specified type is not one of the values.
